headline: American-Israeli Is Pardoned  By Putin After Jerusalem Trip
abstract: Naama Issachar had been sentenced to seven and a half years in prison for a small amount of marijuana. The case was linked to the American extradition of a Russian man.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW â€” An American-Israeli woman was pardoned on Wednesday, months after her severe punishment on charges of having a small amount of marijuana had made her an unwitting pawn in a geopolitical game.
